markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spring-Loaded Net Launcher](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1269)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Gadget" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=405" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 23</row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small bronze cylinder is about the size of a potion bottle. When you activate the launcher, it fires an unattached [net](/Equipment.aspx?ID=681) requiring only a single hand, and at a greater distance. As normal, you make a ranged attack roll against a Medium or smaller creature, but you can target a creature up to 60 feet away, instead of only 20 feet away. The net trap otherwise functions as an unattached net.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spring-Loaded Net Launcher

text: <title level="1" right="Item 2" pfs="Standard" > Spring-Loaded Net Launcher Source Grand Bazaar pg. 23 Price 6 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk 1 Activate Single Action Interact --- This small bronze cylinder is about the size of a potion bottle. When you activate the launcher, it fires an unattached net requiring only a single hand, and at a greater distance. As normal, you make a ranged attack roll against a Medium or smaller creature, but you can target a creature up to 60 feet away, instead of only 20 feet away. The net trap otherwise functions as an unattached net.
